title: Attention: What the Model Focuses On
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Attention: What the Model Focuses On.

hook.text: In 'The bank by the river,' how does the model know it's about water, not money?

buildup.text: Attention lets each token look at every other token and decide which ones matter.

discovery.text: Each token asks 'who should I pay attention to?' via query-key-value dot products.

twist.text: Multi-head attention runs this process multiple times in parallelâ€”different perspectives.

climax.text: 'Attention is all you need' replaced recurrence and convolution for language.

options: Lets each token decide which other tokens matter
